staxel.village.dialogue.ScientistGiveIte: (안함)Oh! Is that a gift for me?
(안함)Thank you! This certainly piques my curiosity!
(안함)I doubt there are many such specimens out there!
(안함)This is a fine specimen, though I've seen better.
(안함)Ugh! Thank you, but...I'm not really into this kind of thing.
(안함)Science calls, I'm afraid. You're not going to be pulling me away just yet!
(안함)Oho! Are you giving that ^c:d03e37;friendship bracelet^c:pop; to me?
(안함)Well this is certainly an unforseen turn of events!
(안함)It will be strange to have to commute to my lab from now on...
(안함)Unless...should I move that with me too?
(안함)Oh. So you just felt like showing it to me?
